short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Smartflow Digital Monitor Chrome extension that simplifies the process of selecting and deleting elements on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension associated with a web application called Smartflow Digital Monitor that allows the users to edit website to improve exhibition in screen devices. Currently in development.
